column1: #text=The first thing to do is to make sure you have the ingridents that is required to make a cake .
#text=If I do n't I just head to the store and buy some supplies to make a cake and everything else I had to buy while I am there .
#text=In order to bake the cake , I preheat my oven to 350 degrees , and then i grease the cake pan .
#text=After the pan has been greased , I get all the wet ingredients and I start mixing them in a bowl .
#text=Then I pull all the dry ingredients and start mixing them in a separate bowl from the wet ingredients .
#text=After both bowls have been mixed in well , I start mixing in the dry ingredients in with the wet ingredients .
#text=After that has been mixed in well , I poor the cake mix into the pan very carefully and make sure it is applied evenly in the pan .
#text=After a while the oven should be ready , and I place the cake pan in the oven rack carefully and let it bake .
